question_text:
Question 60 
 
  
 
 
[Data Structure (Graph)]
 
 
The number of edges present in the forest generated by the DFS traversal of an undirected graph 
G
  with 
100 vertices is 40.  The number of connected components in 
G
 is _________. 
Ans. 
(60 to 60) 
Sol.
 
Given a forest has 100 vertices and 40 edge.
A tree with 100 vertices has (
n
 - 1) edges.
(100 1)
99


 edges
To convert forest into tree, number of edges that should be added
= (No. of components – 1)
Let number of components be 
x
.

  
 
40
(
1)
99
x




  
 
60
x
 
Hence, the correct answer is 60.
